MailItem.map(function (item) {

  item.from = users.find(function (x) {
    return x.uuid === item.fromId;
  });
  return item;
});

}, {

  title: 'Peronal',
  iconSize: 'small'
}];
var getMail = function getMail(limit) {
  return limit ? MailItem.slice(0, limit) : MailItem;
};
var getMailById = function getMailById(uuid) {
  return uuid === undefined ? MailItem[0] : MailItem.find(function (x) {
    return x.uuid === uuid;
  });
};
var getMailByType = function getMailByType(type) {
  return type === 'all' ? MailItem : MailItem.filter(function (x) {
    return x.type === type;
  });
};
export { getMail, MailMenu, getMailById, getMailByType };

// add user to mail
MailItem.map((item) => {
  let users  = User.getUser();
  item.from = users.find(x => x.uuid === item.fromId);
  return item;
});

const getMail = (limit) => {
  return (limit) ? MailItem.slice(0, limit) : MailItem;
};

const getMailById = (uuid) => {
  return (uuid === undefined) ? MailItem[0] : MailItem.find(x => x.uuid === uuid);
};

const getMailByType = (type) => {
  return (type === 'all') ? MailItem : MailItem.filter(x => x.type === type);
};
export {
  getMail,
  MailMenu,
  getMailById,
  getMailByType
};
